text: GM979 cells ( Coriell Cell Repositories , Camden , New Jersey , United States ) were cultured in Ham 's F12 with 2 mM L-glutamine supplemented with heat - inactivated 10 % fetal calf serum ( Ivitrogen , Carlsbad , California , United States ) , penicillin ( 100 units / ml ) , streptomycin 100 mug / ml ) , and L-glutamine ( 2 mM ) .
MEL cells were cultured in DMEM supplemented as above ( without heat inactivating the serum ) .
GM979 cells ( 4 x 105 ) in log phase of growth were transfected with plasmids by FuGENE6 ( Roche , Indianapolis , Indiana , United States ) .

Cells were transfected with <extra_id_0> epsilony <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> promoter reporter constructs ( 500 ng ) along with either empty vector or <extra_id_0> Sox6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> overexpression vector ( 1000 ng ) .
In assays of dosage effect , we used 200 ng , 500 ng , and 1000 ng ) .
pRL-CMV 15ng ( Promega ) was used as a control for transfection efficiency .
